page.title: 20BLURTON HIGH SCHOOL
page.content: There are four blocks in Blurton High school, which are called Main, Tower, Technical and Hem Heath blocks. As first year pupils we study the following subjects in one week; Mathematics, English, French, General Science, P.E., Geography, Music, History, C.D.T., R.E., Home Economics, Computer Appreciation and Art and Craft. In some years girls may have different lessons to boys, but in the first year they do not. We have a house system in which there are three houses, Wedgewood (blue), Spode (red) and Minton (yellow). The houses mainly compete against each other in sporting activities. The school organises holidays for the pupils, and there are other activities which include drama, chess, bird watching, brass band, choir, and computer club.
